body:
Building `unifyfs@0.9.1%gcc@9.3.0` fails using `spack@develop` (44530588628d4a7b12e76b332d03b5b5cab60378 from `Fri Feb 26 00:42:40 2021 +0100`).

Tested on:
* `Ubuntu 20.04 ppc64le`
* `Ubuntu 20.04 x86_64`

Concrete spec: [unifyfs-lkkzcf.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6047452/unifyfs-lkkzcf.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [unifyfs-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6047453/unifyfs-build-out.txt)

Build fails in both cases like so:

```
$> spack install -f ./unifyfs-lkkzcf.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing unifyfs-0.9.1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa762rfv2uu4j7go2
...
==> No patches needed for unifyfs
==> unifyfs: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> unifyfs: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> unifyfs: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make'

1 error found in build log:
     337      CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-sysio.lo
     338    In file included from /usr/include/string.h:495,
     339                     from /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9
            .1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa762rfv2uu4j7go2/spack-src/client/src/unifyfs-in
            ternal.h:77,
     340                     from /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9
            .1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa762rfv2uu4j7go2/spack-src/client/src/unifyfs-sy
            sio.c:43:
     341    In function 'strncpy',
     342        inlined from '_getcwd_impl' at /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stag
            e-unifyfs-0.9.1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa762rfv2uu4j7go2/spack-src/client/s
            rc/unifyfs-sysio.c:248:13:
  >> 343    /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/string_fortified.h:106:10: error
            : '__builtin_strncpy' specified bound depends on the length of the 
            source argument [-Werror=stringop-overflow=]
     344      106 |   return __builtin___strncpy_chk (__dest, __src, __len, __b
            os (__dest));
     345          |          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
            ~~~~~~~~~~~~
     346    /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa76
            2rfv2uu4j7go2/spack-src/client/src/unifyfs-sysio.c: In function '_g
            etcwd_impl':
     347    /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa76
            2rfv2uu4j7go2/spack-src/client/src/unifyfs-sysio.c:216:18: note: le
            ngth computed here
     348      216 |     size_t len = strlen(unifyfs_cwd) + 1;
     349          |                  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.1-lkkzcfalw34jdcbfa762rfv2uu4j7go2/spack-build-out.txt

```

Looks like the use of `-Werror` causes build to fail on GCC 9.3.0:
```
$> grep -Inr Werror <UNIFY-FS-SOURCE-DIR>/*
./aclocal.m4:475:      # or remarks (even with -Werror).  So we grep stderr for any message
./client/src/Makefile.am:13:AM_CFLAGS = -Wall -Wno-strict-aliasing -Werror

./client/src/Makefile.in:428:  -Wall -Werror \
./client/src/Makefile.in:433:  -Wall -Werror \

./common/src/Makefile.in:444:AM_CFLAGS = -Wall -Werror -Wno-strict-aliasing

./meta/src/Makefile.am:41:AM_CFLAGS += -Wall -Werror

```

@CamStan
title: unifyfs: use of -Werror prevents build with GCC 9.3.0?
